mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE hourlySequence AS ( SELECT DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -((#{days} * 24) - 1) HOUR) AS minute_time UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(minute_time, INTERVAL 30 minute) FROM hourlySequence WHERE minute_time < NOW() ) select hs.minute_time as time, sum(if(count is null, 0, count)) as count from online_count as oc right join hourlySequence as hs on substr(hs.minute_time, 1, 13) = substr(oc.time, 1, 13) group by hs.minute_time
select count(*) from operator_log where type != 'GET'

WITH RECURSIVE hourlySequence AS ( SELECT DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -((#{days} * 24) - 1) HOUR) AS time UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(time, INTERVAL 1 HOUR) FROM hourlySequence WHERE time < NOW() ) select hs.time, sum(if(ol.`event` = '/login', 1, 0)) as count from operator_log as ol right join hourlySequence as hs on substr(hs.time, 1, 13) = substr(ol.create_date, 1, 13) group by hs.time
